channel.title: Can't get server online, HELP!
channel.description:
Well... i have downloaded a source all-star scape V.2 My router is Net Comm NB5 ADSL+2 modem, to port forward i go to advanced settings>application>port foward. I've set 2 at the moment, One resulting to my default gateway 192.168.1.1 and the other the one that my DUC client says that it is updating too. I go to server status and try to add it, but then it says "sorry, (server name) must be online before you can register it here". I was wondering maybe i did something wrong, forgot something or just completely misunderstood this whole private server thing.. If you think you know whats wrong, please post and help me out. i don't understand, im new to this port-fowarding and such :confused:
thanks <aspectz>

item.title: Can't get server online, HELP!
item.dc:creator: @aspectz aspectz
item.description:
@aspectz wrote:

Well… i have downloaded a source all-star scape V.2
My router is Net Comm NB5 ADSL+2 modem, to port forward i go to advanced settings>application>port foward.
I’ve set 2 at the moment, One resulting to my default gateway 192.168.1.1 and the other the one that my DUC client says that it is updating too.
I go to server status and try to add it, but then it says “sorry, (server name) must be online before you can register it here”.
I was wondering maybe i did something wrong, forgot something or just completely misunderstood this whole private server thing… If you think you know whats wrong, please post and help me out. i don’t understand, im new to this port-fowarding and such

thanks
